titles.title: A resolution recognizing the work and accomplishments of Mr. Britt "Max" Mayfield, Director of the National Hurricane Center's Tropical Prediction Center upon his retirement.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/16/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Honors Mr. Britt "Max" Mayfield's 34 years of service and his commitment to improving the accuracy of hurricane forecasting upon his retirement as Director of the National Hurricane Center's Tropical Prediction Center. Commends Mr. Mayfield's dedication to expanding educational opportunities for state and local emergency management officials.
